English: A simple Windows GUI application to display what state the cap lock key is in.
Displays a PopUp when you press your Caps Lock key to show what case it is in.
Settings to change position of Popup.
Settings to control application startup and minimise preferences.
A Windows application that provides an on-screen popup to display the current state of the Caps Lock key.
